A movie centered about Nagi Seishirou before he enters Blue Lock.

metas.name: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby - BEGINNING OF A NEW ERA
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Slice of Life, Sports Tags:Kemonomimi/Primarily Female Cast/Athletics The film follows Jungle Pocket, who wishes to participate in the Triple Crown Classic race, which can only be run once in a lifetime. She faces rivals Agnes Tachyon and Manhattan Cafe.

(Source: Anime News Network)

Note: Relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.

Theatrical cut of the Courtesan of a Nation Arc (episodes 257-261). The movie is a part of the "Gintama 20th Anniversary Project".

metas.name: Oomuro-ke: dear friends
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Cute Girls Doing Cute Things A spin-off of the Yuru Yuri series featuring Sakurako and her sisters. The second film of the Oomuro-ke duology.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

metas.name: i☆Ris the Movie: Full Energy!!
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Music Tags:Isekai/Idol i☆Ris has reached the 10th anniversary of their debut and is enjoying smooth sailing, but there was a thought that came to the minds of the girls. "What will happen to us in the next 10 years?"

On the day of a live concert, a mysterious talking white squirrel suddenly appears from a T-shirt of goods delivered to i☆Ris' dressing room! Suddenly, they are enveloped in a dazzling light, and what spreads out before their eyes is a mysterious world with many big rainbows floating on it. This is Risu Risu Land, a world where you can be anything you want to be!

The five of them are enjoying themselves in this fun and wonderful place, fulfilling their dreams, but they realize that there is something "missing" in this world. There is no "song" in this world. Shirorisu asks i☆Ris for help to bring back the "song"....

Why did the "song" disappear? Can they bring "Song" back to this world once again? And at the end of this journey, will the girls find what they really want to be?　

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

metas.name: RABBITS KINGDOM THE MOVIE
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Music Tags: A project to commemorate the 10th Anniversary of Tsukiuta.

The Black Rabbit Kingdom and the White Rabbit Kingdom — Two different worlds existing side by side. The two worlds, which were supposed to be a "pair," had never met, perhaps by a twist of fate. The situation remained unstable and incomplete.

Hajime, the young king of the Balck Rabbit Kingdom, is distressed by the calamities in the surrounding countries. The Prime Minister Haru, his close aides Kakeru and Koi, the prince Aoi, and his escort Arata are busy preparing for the upcoming World Congress and the ball to commemorate the 15th anniversary of Hajime's reign.

At the same time, in the White Rabbit Kingdom at the suggestion of Shuno, who calls himself the Demon King, the king, Kai, the prince, Rui, the guards, Yoh and Iku, and the former military officer, Yoru, are going on a "picnic" to the Black Rabbit Kingdom.

What will be born from the encounter between the Black Rabbit Kingdom and the White Rabbit Kingdom?

(Source: Crunchyroll News)
